thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 2 of 69
thread.title: r dean fisch
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by r dean fisch

author: r dean fisch
title: r dean fisch
text: The filter leaked where it attached at the pipe coming out of the wall. installed and re-installed as directed, wouldn't stop leaking. Finally took it out and threw it in the trash. Then found out I was on the auto ship replacement filter at $54.00 a pop. called to cancel but told too late to stop shipment. Cancelled auto ship and will have to wait and see if they actually did. Filter arrived, too much of a hassle to ship it back, found a woman with a unit and gave it to her even tho she said she didn't need it. Don't waste your money.
